greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A004443(n) if n is odd, a(n) = A004443(n)/2 if n is even.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,0,1,0,-1).
formula: a(n) = ((2+4*i)*(-i)^n+(2-4*i)*i^n-(-3+(-1)^n)*n)/4 for n>0 where i is the imaginary unit.
xref: Skipping the initial term (a(0)=2), this is row 2 of A106449.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 21 2005
